nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier, which restricts a call to happen once the game is started
nodes.name: isStarted

nodes.documentation: @dev Changes the required number of blocks for victory. This may ONLY be called by the "admin" role
nodes.name: setRequiredBlocksElapsedForVictory

nodes.documentation: @dev Changes the minimum fee. This may ONLY be called by the "finance" role
nodes.name: setMinimumFee

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws the available balance. This may ONLY be called by the "finance" role
nodes.name: withdrawBalance
